sources.name: GetDimRelationship
sources.script:
source(output(
		XDimID as integer,
		YDimID as integer,
		DimKindID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> GetDimRelationship

sources.name: TermRelationships
sources.script:
source(output(
		RelationshipID as integer,
		XTermID as integer,
		XTermDimID as integer,
		YTermID as integer,
		YTermDimID as integer,
		TermKindID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> TermRelationships

sources.name: LookupTable
sources.script:
source(output(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> LookupTable

sinks.name: InsertSink
sinks.script:
MarkForInsertion sink(input(
		RelationshipID as integer,
		TermXID as integer,
		TermYID as integer,
		KindID as integer,
		Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		TermXID = XTermID,
		TermYID = YTermID,
		KindID = DimKindID
	)) ~> InsertSink

sinks.name: DeleteSink
sinks.script:
MarkForDeletion sink(input(
		RelationshipID as integer,
		TermXID as integer,
		TermYID as integer,
		KindID as integer,
		Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['RelationshipID'],
	mapColumn(
		RelationshipID,
		TermXID = XTermID,
		TermYID = YTermID,
		KindID = DimKindID
	)) ~> DeleteSink

transformations.name: MergeJoin
transformations.script:
GetDimRelationship, TermRelationships join(XDimID == XTermDimID
	&& YDimID == YTermDimID
	&& DimKindID == TermKindID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> MergeJoin

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit
transformations.script:
MergeJoin split(isNull(XTermID),
	isNull(XDimID),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit@(Insert, Delete, UpdateDoNothing)

transformations.name: Select1
transformations.script:
LookupXTerm select(mapColumn(
		YDimID,
		DimKindID,
		RelationshipID,
		XTermID = TermID,
		YTermID
	))~> Select1

transformations.name: Select2
transformations.script:
LookupYTerm select(mapColumn(
		DimKindID,
		XTermID,
		YTermID = TermID
	))~> Select2

transformations.name: LookupXTerm
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit@Insert, LookupTable join(XDimID == DimID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupXTerm

transformations.name: LookupYTerm
transformations.script:
Select1, LookupTable join(YDimID == DimID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupYTerm

transformations.name: MarkForInsertion
transformations.script: Select2 alterRow(insertIf(isNull(XTermID))) ~> MarkForInsertion

transformations.name: SelectForDeletion
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit@Delete select(mapColumn(
		XDimID,
		DimKindID,
		RelationshipID,
		XTermID,
		YTermID
	))~> SelectForDeletion

transformations.name: MarkForDeletion
transformations.script: SelectForDeletion alterRow(deleteIf(isNull(XDimID))) ~> MarkForDeletion

properties.description: This is the Create Terms dataflow and include lookups to the TermTypeTable in the Taxonomy db.

sources.name: ThesaurusTerms
sources.script:
source(output(
		DimID as integer,
		DimName as string,
		RootID as integer,
		DimPreferred as boolean,
		DimSourceID as integer,
		DimDescription as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> ThesaurusTerms

sources.name: TaxonomyTerms
sources.script:
source(output(
		TermID as integer,
		TermDimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		TermDescription as string,
		TermPreferred as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> TaxonomyTerms

sources.name: TermTypes
sources.script:
source(output(
		TermTypeID as integer,
		TypeName as string,
		Description as string,
		Available as boolean,
		DimTable as string,
		SourceID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> TermTypes

sinks.name: ThesaurusTermsInsert
sinks.script:
SelectForInsertion sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		DimID,
		TermName,
		Preferred = DimPreferred,
		Available,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> ThesaurusTermsInsert

sinks.name: UpdateTerm
sinks.script:
ConditionsForUpdate sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermID,
		TermName = DimName,
		Description = DimDescription,
		Preferred = DimPreferred
	)) ~> UpdateTerm

sinks.name: DeleteSink
sinks.script:
SelectForDelete sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermID,
		Available
	)) ~> DeleteSink

transformations.name: MergeJoin
transformations.script:
SelectFromLookup, TaxonomyTerms join(DimID == TermDimID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> MergeJoin

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit
transformations.script:
MergeJoin split(isNull(TermID),
	isNull(DimID),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit@(Insert, Delete, Update)

transformations.name: SetAvailable
transformations.script: ConditionalSplit@Insert derive(Available = true()) ~> SetAvailable

transformations.name: ConvertRootToTypeID
transformations.script: SetAvailable derive(RootTypeID = toShort(RootID)) ~> ConvertRootToTypeID

transformations.name: ConvertDimIDToTypeID
transformations.script: ThesaurusTerms derive(PossibleTypeID = toShort(DimID)) ~> ConvertDimIDToTypeID

transformations.name: ConvertNameAndDesc
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit@Update derive(DimTypeName = left(DimName, 80),
		DimTypeDescription = left(DimDescription, 500)) ~> ConvertNameAndDesc

transformations.name: ConditionsForInsertion
transformations.script: Lookup2 alterRow(insertIf(isNull(TermID))) ~> ConditionsForInsertion

transformations.name: SelectForInsertion
transformations.script:
ConditionsForInsertion select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		DimPreferred,
		TermName = DimName,
		TermTypeID = RootTypeID,
		Available = SetAvailable@Available
	))~> SelectForInsertion

transformations.name: ConditionsForDelete
transformations.script: ConditionalSplit@Delete alterRow(updateIf(isNull(DimID))) ~> ConditionsForDelete

transformations.name: DerivedColumn1
transformations.script: ConditionsForDelete derive(Available = false()) ~> DerivedColumn1

transformations.name: SelectForDelete
transformations.script:
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		TermID,
		Available
	))~> SelectForDelete

transformations.name: Lookup1
transformations.script:
ConvertDimIDToTypeID, TermTypes lookup(DimName == TypeName
	&& DimSourceID == SourceID
	&& PossibleTypeID == TermTypeID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1

transformations.name: SelectFromLookup
transformations.script:
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		RootID,
		DimPreferred,
		DimDescription,
		PossibleTypeID,
		DimName = TypeName,
		DimSourceID = SourceID
	))~> SelectFromLookup

transformations.name: Lookup2
transformations.script:
ConvertRootToTypeID, TermTypes lookup(PossibleTypeID == TermTypes@TermTypeID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup2

transformations.name: ConditionsForUpdate
transformations.script: SelectUpdate alterRow(updateIf(not(isNull(TermID)))) ~> ConditionsForUpdate

transformations.name: SelectUpdate
transformations.script:
ConvertNameAndDesc select(mapColumn(
		DimName,
		DimPreferred,
		DimDescription,
		TermID
	))~> SelectUpdate

sources.name: TermRelationships
sources.script:
source(output(
		RelationshipID as integer,
		TermXID as integer,
		TermYID as integer,
		KindID as integer,
		Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> TermRelationships

sinks.name: DeleteSink
sinks.script:
DelIfTermYIDIsNull sink(input(
		RelationshipID as integer,
		TermXID as integer,
		TermYID as integer,
		KindID as integer,
		Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['RelationshipID']) ~> DeleteSink

transformations.name: DelIfTermXIDIsNull
transformations.script: TermRelationships alterRow(deleteIf(isNull(TermXID))) ~> DelIfTermXIDIsNull

transformations.name: DelIfTermYIDIsNull
transformations.script: DelIfTermXIDIsNull alterRow(deleteIf(isNull(TermYID))) ~> DelIfTermYIDIsNull

sources.name: PortfolioDimensionTables
sources.script:
source(output(
		DimTableName as string,
		DimID as integer,
		DimCode as string,
		DimName as string,
		DimDescription as string,
		DimActive as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> PortfolioDimensionTables

sources.name: TaxonomyDimensionTerms
sources.script:
source(output(
		TermDimTable as string,
		TermID as integer,
		TermDimID as long,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		TermDescription as string,
		TermPreferred as boolean,
		TermAvailable as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> TaxonomyDimensionTerms

sources.name: LookupType
sources.script:
source(output(
		TermTypeID as integer,
		DimTable as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> LookupType

sinks.name: SinkIntoTermTaxonomy
sinks.script:
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		TermID,
		DimID,
		TermCode = DimCode,
		TermName = DimName,
		Description = DimDescription,
		Preferred,
		Available = DimActive,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> SinkIntoTermTaxonomy

sinks.name: DeleteTerm
sinks.script:
MarkForDeletion sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermID']) ~> DeleteTerm

sinks.name: UpdateSink
sinks.script:
SelectForUpdate sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermID,
		DimID,
		TermCode = DimCode,
		TermName = DimName,
		Description = DimDescription,
		Preferred,
		Available = DimActive,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> UpdateSink

transformations.name: MergeJoin
transformations.script:
PortfolioDimensionTables, TaxonomyDimensionTerms join(DimID == TermDimID
	&& DimTableName == TermDimTable,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> MergeJoin

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit
transformations.script:
MergeJoin split(isNull(TermID),
	isNull(DimID),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit@(Insert, Delete, Update)

transformations.name: DerivedColumn
transformations.script: ConditionalSplit@Insert derive(Preferred = true()) ~> DerivedColumn

transformations.name: Lookup1
transformations.script:
DerivedColumn, LookupType lookup(DimTableName == DimTable,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1

transformations.name: SelectForInsertion
transformations.script:
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		DimCode,
		DimName,
		DimDescription,
		DimActive,
		TermID,
		Preferred,
		TermTypeID = LookupType@TermTypeID
	))~> SelectForInsertion

transformations.name: SelectForDeletion
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit@Delete select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		TermID,
		TermCode,
		TermName
	))~> SelectForDeletion

transformations.name: MarkForDeletion
transformations.script: SelectForDeletion alterRow(deleteIf(isNull(DimID))) ~> MarkForDeletion

transformations.name: SelectForUpdate
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit@Update select(mapColumn(
		DimCode,
		DimDescription,
		DimActive,
		DimName,
		DimID,
		TermID,
		Preferred = TermPreferred,
		TermTypeID
	))~> SelectForUpdate

transformations.name: AlterRow1
transformations.script: SelectForInsertion alterRow(insertIf(isNull(TermID))) ~> AlterRow1

transformations.name: Filter1
transformations.script: Lookup1 filter(not(isNull(DimTable))) ~> Filter1

sources.name: TurasDimensionTables
sources.script:
source(output(
		DimTableName as string,
		DimID as long,
		DimCode as string,
		DimName as string,
		DimDescription as string,
		DimActive as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> TurasDimensionTables

sources.name: TaxonomyDimensionTerms
sources.script:
source(output(
		TermDimTable as string,
		TermID as integer,
		TermDimID as long,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		TermDescription as string,
		TermPreferred as boolean,
		TermAvailable as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> TaxonomyDimensionTerms

sources.name: LookupType
sources.script:
source(output(
		TermTypeID as integer,
		DimTable as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> LookupType

sinks.name: SinkIntoTermTaxonomy
sinks.script:
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		TermID,
		DimID,
		Preferred
	)) ~> SinkIntoTermTaxonomy

sinks.name: DeleteTerm
sinks.script:
MarkForDeletion sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermID,
		DimID,
		TermCode,
		TermName
	)) ~> DeleteTerm

sinks.name: UpdateSink
sinks.script:
MarkForUpdate sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermID,
		Description,
		Available = DimActive
	)) ~> UpdateSink

transformations.name: MergeJoin
transformations.script:
TurasDimensionTables, TaxonomyDimensionTerms join(DimID == TermDimID
	&& DimTableName == TermDimTable,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> MergeJoin

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit
transformations.script:
MergeJoin split(isNull(TermID),
	isNull(DimID),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit@(Insert, Delete, Update)

transformations.name: DerivedColumn
transformations.script: ConditionalSplit@Insert derive(Preferred = true()) ~> DerivedColumn

transformations.name: Lookup1
transformations.script:
DerivedColumn, LookupType lookup(DimTableName == DimTable,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1

transformations.name: SelectForInsertion
transformations.script:
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		DimCode,
		DimName,
		DimDescription,
		DimActive,
		TermID,
		Preferred,
		TermTypeID = LookupType@TermTypeID
	))~> SelectForInsertion

transformations.name: SelectForDeletion
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit@Delete select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		TermID,
		TermCode,
		TermName
	))~> SelectForDeletion

transformations.name: MarkForDeletion
transformations.script: SelectForDeletion alterRow(deleteIf(isNull(DimID))) ~> MarkForDeletion

transformations.name: SelectForUpdate
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit@Update select(mapColumn(
		DimCode,
		DimName,
		Description = DimDescription,
		DimActive,
		TermID
	))~> SelectForUpdate

transformations.name: MarkForUpdate
transformations.script: SelectForUpdate alterRow(updateIf(not(isNull(TermID)))) ~> MarkForUpdate

transformations.name: AlterRow1
transformations.script: SelectForInsertion alterRow(insertIf(isNull(TermID))) ~> AlterRow1

sources.name: GetThesaurusTypes
sources.script:
source(output(
		DimId as integer,
		DimName as string,
		DimDescription as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> GetThesaurusTypes

sources.name: GetTaxonomyTermTypes
sources.script:
source(output(
		TermTypeID as integer,
		TypeName as string,
		TypeDescription as string,
		TypeAvailable as boolean,
		TypeSourceID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> GetTaxonomyTermTypes

sinks.name: InsertSink
sinks.script:
AssignForInsertion sink(input(
		TermTypeID as integer,
		TypeName as string,
		Description as string,
		Available as boolean,
		DimTable as string,
		SourceID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermTypeID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermTypeID,
		TypeName,
		Description = TypeName,
		Available = TypeAvailable,
		SourceID = DimSourceID
	)) ~> InsertSink

sinks.name: UpdateSink
sinks.script:
SelectForUpdate sink(input(
		TermTypeID as integer,
		TypeName as string,
		Description as string,
		Available as boolean,
		DimTable as string,
		SourceID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermTypeID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermTypeID,
		TypeName = DimTypeName,
		Description = DimTypeDescription
	)) ~> UpdateSink

sinks.name: DeleteSink
sinks.script:
TermTypeSoftDelete sink(input(
		TermTypeID as integer,
		TypeName as string,
		Description as string,
		Available as boolean,
		DimTable as string,
		SourceID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermTypeID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermTypeID,
		TypeName,
		Description,
		Available = TypeAvailable,
		SourceID = TypeSourceID
	)) ~> DeleteSink

sinks.name: DeleteAvailableFromTermSink
sinks.script:
SoftDeleteTermTable sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermTypeID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> DeleteAvailableFromTermSink

transformations.name: MergeJoin
transformations.script:
GetThesaurusTypes, GetTaxonomyTermTypes join(DimId == TermTypeID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> MergeJoin

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit1
transformations.script:
MergeJoin split(isNull(TermTypeID),
	isNull(DimId),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(insert, delete, update)

transformations.name: ConvertDimToType
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit1@insert derive(DimAvailable = true(),
		DimSourceID = 2,
		DimTypeName = left(DimName, 80),
		DimTypeDescription = left(DimDescription, 500)) ~> ConvertDimToType

transformations.name: SelectColumnsToInsert
transformations.script:
ConvertDimToType select(mapColumn(
		TermTypeID = DimId,
		TypeName = DimTypeName,
		TypeDescription = DimTypeDescription,
		TypeAvailable = DimAvailable,
		DimSourceID
	))~> SelectColumnsToInsert

transformations.name: ConvertNameAndDesc
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit1@update derive(DimTypeName = left(DimName, 80),
		DimTypeDescription = left(DimDescription, 500)) ~> ConvertNameAndDesc

transformations.name: SelectForUpdate
transformations.script:
ConditionForUpdate select(mapColumn(
		TermTypeID,
		DimTypeName,
		DimTypeDescription
	))~> SelectForUpdate

transformations.name: ConditionForUpdate
transformations.script: ConvertNameAndDesc alterRow(updateIf(not(isNull(DimName)))) ~> ConditionForUpdate

transformations.name: ConditionForDelete
transformations.script: ConditionalSplit1@delete alterRow(updateIf(isNull(DimId))) ~> ConditionForDelete

transformations.name: TermTypeSoftDelete
transformations.script:
SelectValueToModify select(mapColumn(
		TermTypeID,
		TypeName,
		TypeAvailable,
		TypeSourceID,
		Description = TypeDescription
	))~> TermTypeSoftDelete

transformations.name: SelectValueToModify
transformations.script: ConditionForDelete derive(TypeAvailable = TypeAvailable == false()) ~> SelectValueToModify

transformations.name: SoftDeleteTermTable
transformations.script:
SelectValueToModify select(mapColumn(
		TermTypeID,
		TypeName,
		TypeDescription,
		TypeAvailable
	))~> SoftDeleteTermTable

transformations.name: AssignForInsertion
transformations.script: SelectColumnsToInsert alterRow(insertIf(isNull(TermTypeID))) ~> AssignForInsertion

properties.description: Pipeline to create the Thesaurus Terms (Dim) Source dataset for use in the CreateTerms dataflow

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT CAST(Term.id AS BIGINT)  DimID, 
       CAST(Term.name AS NVARCHAR(200)) DimName, 
       dbo.GetRootParent(Term.id) RootID,
       CAST(CASE ISNULL(Relation.relationship, 0)
          WHEN 0 THEN 1
          ELSE 0
          END AS BIT) DimPreferred,
       CAST(2 AS SMALLINT) DimSourceID,
       CAST(RTRIM(Term.scope + ' ' + Term.additionalnotes) AS NVARCHAR(500)) DimDescription
  from dbo.Term
   LEFT JOIN dbo.Relation ON Relation.relatedtermid = Term.id AND Relation.relationship=2
  ORDER BY DimID

activities.name: UpsertToTermTable
activities.description: Pipeline to upsert to the term table in the PortThesaurus DB

properties.description: Uses a query to create a table for use in the Create Relationships dataflow source table entitled 'Get Dim relationship'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT maintermid XDimID, relatedtermid YDimID,
CAST(CASE relationship
  WHEN 1 THEN 2 -- synonym
  WHEN 4 THEN 1 -- parent/child
  WHEN 5 THEN 4 --association
  END AS SMALLINT) DimKindID
FROM dbo.Relation WHERE relationship IN (1, 4, 5) 
AND relatedtermid <> maintermid
ORDER BY XDimID, YDimID, DimKindID;

properties.description: Uses a query to copy from the TermRelationship and Term table on the Taxonomy db.  Used in the Term relationships sink in the Create relationships dataflow.

activities.name: CopyLocalToTermRelationships
activities.description: Uses a query to create the TermRelationships table on the AzureDB

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT TermRelationship.RelationshipID, TermX.TermID XTermID, TermX.DimID XTermDimID,
  TermY.TermID YTermID, TermY.DimID YTermDimID,
  TermRelationship.KindID TermKindID
FROM dbo.TermRelationship
  LEFT JOIN dbo.Term TermX on TermX.TermID = TermRelationship.TermXID
  LEFT JOIN dbo.Term TermY on TermY.TermID = TermRelationship.TermYID
  LEFT JOIN dbo.TermType on TermType.TermTypeID = TermX.TermTypeID
WHERE TermType.SourceID = 2
ORDER BY TermX.DimID, TermY.DimID, TermKindID;

properties.description: Copy the contents of the TermType table on the local db to the TermTypeSource table on Azure.

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT TermTypeID, TypeName, Description TypeDescription, Available TypeAvailable, SourceID TypeSourceID FROM dbo.TermType WHERE SourceID = 2

properties.description: Copy the term table from local host to an Azure DB

activities.name: LoadFromTermTable
activities.description: Load from local machine to Azure db

source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select 
		DISTINCT CAST(T.ID AS SMALLINT) DimID, 
		CAST(T.name AS NVARCHAR(200)) DimName, 
		CAST(T.scope + ' ' + T.additionalnotes AS NVARCHAR(2000)) DimDescription 
FROM 
		dbo.Term T
  LEFT OUTER JOIN 
		dbo.Relation RB on RB.maintermid = T.id AND RB.Relationship =3
  LEFT OUTER JOIN 
		dbo.Relation RN on RN.maintermid = T.id AND RN.Relationship =4
  WHERE 
		RB.id IS NULL AND RN.id IS NOT NULL
  ORDER BY 
		DimID

activities.name: LoadFromTermTypeTable
activities.description: Copy from local term type table to Azure db

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
		TermTypeID, TypeName, Description TypeDescription, Available TypeAvailable, SourceID TypeSourceID 
FROM 
		dbo.TermType WHERE SourceID = 2
